name: Jeram's Bracers
flavorText: You can still see traces of the blood left by the demonic multitudes Jeram slew on his quest for revenge.
flavorTextHtml: You can still see traces of the blood left by the demonic multitudes Jeram slew on his quest for revenge.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [4.5 - 6.0]%

secondary.textHtml: Wall of Death deals 85% increased damage and can be cast up to three times within 2 seconds before the cooldown begins. (Witch Doctor Only) [75 - 100]%
